postfix.cpp

00001 #include <stdio.h>
00002 #include <iostream>
00003 #include <stdlib.h>
00004 #include <stack>
00005 #include <string.h>
00006 #include <cmath>
00007 #include <math.h>
00008 
00009 using namespace std;
00010 
00011 int main()
00012 {
00013     char exp[1000], buffer[15];
00014     int i,op1, op2, len, j, x;
00015     stack<int> s;
00016     printf("Enter a Postfix Expression:\n");
00017     gets(exp);
00018     len = strlen(exp);
00019     j = 0;
00020     for(i=0; i<len;i++){
00021 
00022         if(exp[i]>='0' && exp[i]<='9'){
00023             buffer[j++] = exp[i];
00024         }
00025         else if(exp[i]==' '){
00026             if(j>0){
00027                 buffer[j] = '\0';
00028                 x = atoi(buffer);
00029                 s.push (x);
00030                 j = 0;
00031             }
00032         }
00033 
00034         else if(exp[i]=='+' || exp[i]=='-' || exp[i]=='*' || exp[i]==':' || exp[i]=='%' || exp[i]=='/'){
00035             op1 = s.top();
00036             s.pop();
00037             op2 = s.top();
00038             s.pop();
00039             switch(exp[i]){
00040                 case '+':
00041                     s.push(op2 + op1);
00042                     break;
00043                 case '-':
00044                     s.push(op2 - op1);
00045                     break;
00046                 case '*':
00047                     s.push(op2 * op1);
00048                     break;
00049                 case ':':
00050                     s.push(op2 / op1);
00051                     break;
00052                 case '%':
00053                     s.push(op2 % op1);
00054                     break;
00055                 case '/':
00056                     int div;
00057                     div = (int)floor(op2 / op1);
00058                     s.push(div);
00059                     break;
00060             }
00061         }
00062     }
00063     printf("Answer is %d\n", s.top());
00064     return 0;
00065 }
